casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Dwight BACON NO. 2019-KH-0319 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 15, 2019

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing *1119that level of review, La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
